::Switchblade/Astroblast::

Switchblade gets up, then falls back over holding his head. "Oooo, 
ouch," He cloaks, and sits in the corner, "Heh, nobody's going to 
bother me on the return trip."

A second later, Astroblast's voice comes out of the back speakers, 
"Switchblade, don't cloak in Megatron's presence."

"Wha, What? How'd you know I was cloaking?" demands 
Switchblade.

"I didn't know, but you just confirmed it," replies Astroblast in a 
superior tone.

"One of these days..." Switchblade grumbles to him self, as he 
decloaks. He begins to sulk in his original place, scheming about 
how he plans to create some devastating bots, first of which, the 
leader of them, will be that ugly Maximal in the Dark Avian. He will 
become... Nightstrike, silent, deadly, and intelligent. A perfect 
combination. His reflective optics begin to glow green as he thinks.


On 15 Apr 2001, at 6:12, gestalt_menasor@... wrote:

> Motormaster walks up beside Switchblade, and toweringly looks down on 
> him. With a large sneer on his face he reaches down with one hand and 
> encircles Switchblade's head. Then in one fluid moting his arm swings 
> back, taking Switchblades body with it, and he lets go, sending 
> Switchblade to the rear. "Your seat awaits you my lord" Motormaster 
> says to Megatron, moving out of the way, motioning to the seat. 
> Megatron sits down in the command chair. "I am taking control 
> Astroblast, you will drop us off at the following coordinates, then 
> head back to base with these orders." He types the orders into 
> Astroblast, then waites until he is given control.
>
